title: I'm a Rengo main - will I be good at Kha'Zix ?
body:
I am a rengo main and never lost (as Rengar) against a KhaZix.
I could buy a 3. rune page, which ould be used for yi, or Kha.
WHAT SHOULD I DO ? :/


{{champion:107}}  = {{champion:121}} 
****

replies.body: You have lost to a kha zix as rengar lol dont lie to urself.

You won't be good at him if you are going in with the same mindset as Rengar, he has weaknesses that Rengar doesn't have and strengths that he doesn't have as well.

If you go in with a learning mindset like any other new champion you should be fine.
